params.tokenId: token id to retrieve hash for
token id to retrieve content for

mint(address,string,bytes32,string,addre.details: Creates a new token for `to`. Its token ID will be automatically assigned (and available on the emitted {IERC721-Transfer} event), and the token URI autogenerated based on the base URI passed at construction. See {ERC721-_mint}. Requirements: - the caller must have the `MINTER_ROLE`.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.salePrice: - the sale price of the NFT asset specified by _tokenId
params.tokenId: - the NFT asset queried for royalty information

returns.receiver: - address of who should be sent the royalty payment

params.newAddress: new address to recieve royalty payout on-chain
params.tokenId: token id to set royalty payout for
token id to get uri for

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.newMetadataContent: new metadata content json string to update
params.tokenId: token id to update the metadata for

burn(uint256).notice: Only owner of token can burn.

updateMetadataContent(uint256,string).notice: Updates the metadata content to a new string for new schemas / adding licenses and metadata uri updates Only callable by the contract owner.
